name: Pizzaman (eviluser7)
description:
Fullscreen mode is recommended.

Feed your customers!
Feed all the customers that get in your way. Avoid them leaving your restaurant!

Gameplay
W&S to move, A&D to change direction
E for action (if watching to the left, throw a pizza, if watching to the right, grab a pizza)
For each customer you feed, you gain points. If they leave, you lose!

Source code: https://github.com/eviluser7/some-raylib/tree/main/pizzaman
